text: The Visual Effects Society (VES) is an entertainment organization representing all visual effects practitioners: artists, animators, model makers, supervisors, technologists, studio leaders, PR/marketing personals related to film, television programs, music videos, and video games. It has produced the Visual Effects Society Awards which honor the best works in various categories, such as Star Wars (1977), Blade Runner (1982), etc. ==References== ==Other websites== * VES official website * Visual Effects Society (VES) Awards Category:Entertainment
title: Visual Effects Society
